Defining URL:https://github.com/BIH-CEI/RareLink/ImplementationGuide/rarelink-ig
Version:2.0.2
Name:RareLinkImplementationGuide
Title:RareLink Implementation Guide
Status:Draft as of 2025-05-08 01:03:44+0900
Definition:

An Implementation Guide for RareLink Common Data Model, based on the ontology-based rare disease common data model (RD-CDM) harmonising the European Rare Disease Infrastructure Common Data Set, HL7 FHIR R4, and Phenopackets; and integrating the IPS 2.0.2 profiles and Genomics Reporting 3.0.0 profiles.

Publisher:Berlin Institute of Health - Charité Universitätsmedizin Berlin. Berlin Institute of Health - Charité Universitätsmedizin Berlin, , Email
Source Resource:XML / JSON / Turtle
